thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com
thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: Excellent. Took me on time, explained what was being done and made sure they had numbers to call me. I was surprised one came so soon, they expected two hours, and two hours it was. I will return if needed (but hope not to). I would also recommend Town Fair to others.
